thread.title: Compact triple-port fast charger: Ugreen Nexode 65-watt nears all-time low price on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News
thread.title_full: Compact triple-port fast charger: Ugreen Nexode 65-watt nears all-time low price on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News

author: Sambit Saha
title: Compact triple-port fast charger: Ugreen Nexode 65-watt nears all-time low price on Amazon - NotebookCheck.net News
text: The Ugreen Nexode 65-watt GaN charger is once again available at an attractive discounted price on Amazon. Currently available for just a few cents above its lowest-ever price, the capable triple-port fast charger can be purchased for just $22.77 for a limited time on the platform. Like most modern GaN chargers, the Ugreen Nexode 65-watt is impressively compact, coming in at just 2.6 x 1.57 x 1.2 inches. Weighing just 130 grams, the charger is also easy to carry around, and its folding prongs definitely makes life easier when on the go. As the name suggests, the chargers can provide a peak output of 65 watts, making it a decent choice for not just smartphones and tablets, but also lightweight notebooks. For instance, Ugreen claims that the M3 MacBook Air can be juiced up to half capacity in just half an hour, which is pretty decent. The port selection consists of dual USB Type-C and a single Type-A port, rated for 65 watts, 65 watts, and 22.5 watts respectively. Of course, when more than one port is utilized, the output configuration changes. When all three ports are in use, the three ports can output a maximum of 45, 8.5, and 8.5 watts respectively. On the other hand, dual-port output is a bit more complicated, and is best described by the following image. Safety conscious folks will appreciate the standard safety features on offer, such as short-circuit, overheat, and overcurrent protections. At its current price on Amazon, the Ugreen Nexode 65-watt GaN charger is a very decent deal for folks who require a capable fast charger with multiple ports. Considering that the charger is sold directly by Ugreen's official Amazon US store, customers can make their purchase stress-free, and take advantage of Amazon's refund policy if necessary. Disclaimer: Notebookcheck is not responsible for price changes carried out by retailers. The discounted price or deal mentioned in this item was available at the time of writing and may be subject to time restrictions and/or limited unit availability. Amazon (linked above), spotted by SlickDeals
